text:
About Meghan Molloy 
 
Where does Meghan currently work? 
Meghan is not currently employed, but is actively seeking employment. 
 
Where is Meghan from? 
Virginia Beach, VA. 
 
Where does Meghan currently live? 
Virginia Beach, VA. 
 
Who is Meghan’s father? 
Meghan’s father is Edward Molloy, Jr. a retired Naval Officer, originally from Braintree, 
Massachusetts, Edward and his wife currently reside in Virginia. 
 
Who is Meghan’s mother? 
Meghan’s mother is Lynda Molloy, she is a Neonatal ICU nurse at the Children’s Hospital of the 
King’s Daughters in Norfolk, VA. Lynda is originally from Braintree, Massachusetts, but currently 
resides in Virginia with her husband. 
 
Does Meghan have any siblings? 
Meghan is the youngest of 4 children. Meghan has three older brothers, Shaun, Cory and 
Christopher. 
 
What extracurricular activities did Meghan participate in growing up? 
Meghan played travel/select soccer from the age of 7 until she was 18 years old. Meghan also 
participated in Operation Smile’s Happy Club, helping as a fundraiser for children born with 
cleft-palates to receive the medical treatment they need. 
 
What are Meghan’s hobbies? 
Meghan enjoys photography and videog

ration Smile’s Happy Club, helping as a fundraiser for children born with 
cleft-palates to receive the medical treatment they need. 
 
What are Meghan’s hobbies? 
Meghan enjoys photography and videography, as well as designing 3D models in CAD and 
printing 3D models on her 3D printer. Meghan also enjoys kayaking, fishing and hiking with her 
dog Jack. 
 
What is Meghan passionate about? 
Meghan enjoys spending time with her family and friends and is passionate about being there 
for them. Meghan is also extremely passionate about learning new things, especially when 
those things involve learning to use new technology. 
 
What are Meghan’s core skills? 
● Generative AI & LLM Applications (RAG, prompt engineering, AI workflows) 
● Data Analysis & Performance Analytics 
● Digital Product & UX Strategy (Web & Native Applications) 

● Programming & Markup: HTML, Python, JavaScript, Swift, Kotlin, Dart 
● Marketing Technology (MarTech) & CRM Systems 
● Digital, Social & OTT Advertising 
● Website Architecture, Optimization & SEO 
● AI-Driven Content Creation & Automation 
● Technical Documentation & Process Design 
● Stakeholder Communication & Cross-Functional Collaboration 
● Adobe

Website Architecture, Optimization & SEO

● Videography & Photography Content Creation 
Where did Meghan go to school? 
Meghan went to high school at Cape Henry Collegiate School in Virginia Beach, VA and she 
went to college at Marymount University in Arlington, VA, where she received her Bachelor’s 
Degree in Political Science and minored in Statistics. Meghan also received a certification from 
Johns Hopkins University in Generative AI and LLM development and deployment. 
What is Meghan’s work experience?

direct mail. 
● Conduct market research to identify trends, customer needs, and competitive 
positioning.
